about_the_game: This DLC will create a motto for you in the game, you can use your (Steam) registered email to send an email to ultimateaaron@qq.com stating the motto you need to create, your motto must be civilized and less than 300 words. (Note: This DLC doesn't change the gameplay in any way - it only gives you the right to one motto in the game.) Also note that there can only be one entry per Steam account)
detailed_description: This DLC will create a motto for you in the game, you can use your (Steam) registered email to send an email to ultimateaaron@qq.com stating the motto you need to create, your motto must be civilized and less than 300 words. (Note: This DLC doesn't change the gameplay in any way - it only gives you the right to one motto in the game.) Also note that there can only be one entry per Steam account)
legal_notice: All materials are owned by Lonely Journey Studio, and all infringements such as unpacking and unpacking are prohibited.

Minimum:
  • Processor: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Graphics: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Sound Card: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)

name: LONELY JOURNEY : Private Motto
